title: BeReal is hotter than TikTok. So TikTok is copying it.
description: Instagram, Snapchat and TikTok are racing to copy key features of BeReal, which prompts users to share a candid photo at a random time each day.

title: Queen Elizabeth II is dead, but will live on as cryptocurrency
description: In the days following Queen Elizabeth's passing, more than 40 types of meme coins have been minted, industry experts said.
